name: DinerTown Tycoon
description: The evil Grub Burger fast food chain has bribed their way into DinerTown™ and is threatening to drive out the local diners with their cheap prices, sneaky tactics and the mysterious Ingredient X! It is up to you to take charge and help Flo and the people of DinerTown before it’s too late.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows Vista, XP SP1 & SP2Processor:Pentium 4 1.2 Ghz or fasterMemory:256 MB RAMGraphics:64 MB Video RAM - 800x600 Minimum ResolutionHard Drive:30 MB Available hard drive spaceSound:On board sound or better
